-cg.description: Events locked until required characters recruited

-sl.description: Generated log file also contains event rewards and other detailed information

-sal.description: Recruited characters start at the average character level

-sn.description: Recruited characters start with no equipment

-csrp.description: Each character stat set to random percent of original within given range

-fst.description: SwdTech gauge charges four times faster

-sel.description: SwdTechs learnable by characters without the SwdTech command

-brl.description: Bum Rush requires learning every other blitz

-bel.description: Blitzes learnable by characters without the Blitz command

-lmprp.description: Each lore's MP cost set to random percent of original within given range

-lel.description: Lores learnable by characters without the Lore command

-rnl.description: Leap not available on the Veldt. Rages learnable after every battle

-rnc.description: Charm ability not available from Nightshade rage

-dda.description: Display ability names in dance skills menu

-dns.description: Disable stumbling when dancing in different terrain

-del.description: Dances learnable by characters without the Dance command

-sch.description: Steal Rate is improved and rare steals are more likely

-sca.description: Steal will always succeed if enemy has an item

-rec1.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-rec2.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-rec3.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-rec4.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-rec5.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-rec6.description: Exclude selected command from random possibilities

-nxppd.description: Do not divide experience by number of surviving party members

-lsa.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to %(metavar)s * party average level

-lsh.description: Enemy and boss levels equal to %(metavar)s * highest level in party

-lsce.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each character recruited and esper acquired

-lsced.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

-lsc.description: Enemies and bosses gain %(metavar)s levels for each check completed

-lst.description: Enemies and bosses gain 1 level every %(metavar)s minutes

-hma.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * party averaage level

-hmh.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * highest level in party

-hmce.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited and esper acquired

-hmced.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

-hmc.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales %(metavar)s * each check completed

-hmt.description: Enemy and boss hp/mp scales every %(metavar)s minutes

-xga.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * party averaage level

-xgh.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * highest level in party

-xgce.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited and esper acquired

-xgced.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each character recruited, esper acquired, and dragon defeated

-xgc.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales %(metavar)s * each check completed

-xgt.description: Enemy and boss exp/gp scales every %(metavar)s minutes

-ase.description: Enemy and boss abilities retain element and increase in tier approximately every (%(metavar)s + 3) levels reaching max tier at level (%(metavar)s + 3) * 8

-asr.description: Enemy and boss abilities increase in tier approximately every (%(metavar)s + 3) levels reaching max tier at level (%(metavar)s + 3) * 8

-msl.description: Max level enemies scaled up to. Note: distortion levels still applied

-sed.description: Apply scaling to the eight dragons

-sfb.description: Apply scaling to the final battles

-srp3.description: Apply Shuffle/Random to Phunbaba 3 (otherwise he will only appear in Mobliz WOR)

-bnds.description: Normalize lower boss stats and apply random distortion

-fer.description: Fixed encounters are randomized. Lete River, Serpent Trench, Mine Cart, Imperial Camp, ...

-escr.description: Percent of random encounters escapable including with warp or smoke bombs

-dgne.description: Doom Gaze does not escape and cannot be escaped from

-wnz.description: Wrexsoul does not use Zinger to possess a character until they expire

-mmnu.description: MagiMaster does not cast Ultima before death

-cmd.description: Chadarnook demon form appears for longer and does not immediately switch back to painting

-esrr.description: Original esper spells with random learn rates

-ess.description: Esper spells shuffled with original learn rates

-essrr.description: Esper spells shuffled with random learn rates

-esr.description: Esper spells and learn rates randomized

-esrt.description: Esper spells and learn rates randomized by tier

-emprv.description: Each esper's MP cost set to random value within given range

-emprp.description: Each esper's MP cost set to random percent of original within given range

-eer.description: Each esper equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

-eebr.description: Each esper equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of espers equipable by each character is balanced

-ems.description: Espers can be summoned multiple times in battle

-nm1.description: Character to learn Terra's natural magic

-rnl1.description: Randomize levels Terra learns natural spells

-nm2.description: Character to learn Celes' natural magic

-rnl2.description: Randomize levels Celes learns natural spells

-nmmi.description: Add indicator to status menu for characters with natural magic

-smc.description: Start game with %(metavar)s Moogle Charms. Overrides No Moogle Charms option

-sto.description: Start game with %(metavar)s different random tools

-ier.description: Each item equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

-iebr.description: Each item equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of items equipable by each character is balanced

-ieor.description: Characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

-iesr.description: Shuffle character equipment. After randomization, characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

-ierr.description: Each relic equipable by between %(metavar)s random characters

-ierbr.description: Each relic equipable by %(metavar)s random characters. Total number of relics equipable by each character is balanced

-ieror.description: Characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each relic they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each relic they could previously equip

-iersr.description: Shuffle character relics. After randomization, characters have a %(metavar)s chance of being able to equip each item they could not previously equip. If %(metavar)s negative, characters have a -%(metavar)s chance of not being able to equip each item they could previously equip

-csb.description: Number of battles required to uncurse the cursed shield

-mca.description: All characters can wear Moogle Charm relics which prevent random battles. Overrides Equipable option

-stra.description: All weapons enable swdtech and runic

-saw.description: Atma Weapon moved to higher tier and divisor reduced from 64 to 32

-sisr.description: Shop inventories randomized based on type. All weapon shops randomized, all armor shops, etc...

-sirt.description: Shop inventories randomized based on type and tier. All weapon shops randomized, all armor shops, etc...

-sprv.description: Each item cost set to random value within given range

-sprp.description: Each item cost set to random percent of original within given range

-npi.description: Assign values to items which normally sell for 1 gold. Recommended with random inventory

-snbr.description: Poison, Fire, Ice, Thunder, Gravity, and Pearl Rods not sold in shops

-snes.description: Flame, Ice, and Thunder Shields not sold in shops

-snsb.description: Super Balls not sold in shops

-snee.description: Exp. Eggs not sold in shops

-ccsr.description: Chest contents shuffled and given percent randomized

-ccrs.description: Chest contents randomized by tier. Probability of higher tiers begins low and increases as more chests are opened

-crvr.description: Random number of rewards within given range visible before beginning the match. Remaining rewards will display as question marks

-crm.description: Display rewards in item selection menu. Hidden rewards will display as question marks

-cnee.description: Exp. Eggs will not appear in coliseum

-cnil.description: Illuminas will not appear in coliseum

-ari.description: Normal items randomized. Does not affect unbuyable items or Golem/Zoneseek slots

-anca.description: Unbuyable talking chocobo and 1/1200 airship not offered to increase odds of items/espers

-adeh.description: Door NPC indicates whether espers are still available

-nmc.description: Moogle Charms will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

-nee.description: Exp. Eggs will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

-nil.description: Illuminas will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events

-nu.description: Ultima cannot be learned from espers/items/natural magic

-nfps.description: Paladin/Cursed Shields will not appear in coliseum/auction/shops/chests/events (Narshe WOR exclusive)

-nfce.description: Remove character/esper rewards from: Auction House, Collapsing House, Figaro Castle Throne, Gau's Father's House, Kohlingen Inn, Narshe Weapon Shop, Sealed Gate, South Figaro Basement

-pd.description: Life spells cannot be learned. Fenix Downs unavailable (except from starting items). Buckets/inns/tents/events do not revive characters. Phoenix casts Life 3 on party instead of Life

-fs.description: Sketch missing will not cause various major glitches

-fe.description: Evade used for physical attacks instead of mblock. Fixes Beads, Blind, and other status effect influences

-fvd.description: Vanish does not override instant death immunity

-fr.description: Retort will not counter various actions infinitely with Imp status

-fj.description: Fix characters disappearing as a result of jump/super ball/launcher interactions

-fbs.description: Poltergeist and Inferno in Kefka's Tower cannot be skipped

-fedc.description: Enemy damage counters only trigger if HP is reduced

-as.description: Player always sprints. Sprint Shoes have no effect

-ond.description: Display original character names in party and party select menus

-rr.description: Randomize in-game RNG table. Affects Setzer's Slots, Auction House, Ebot's Rock, ...

-rc.description: Randomize clock's correct time and NPC clues in Zozo

-scan.description: All enemies scannable. All characters start with scan learned. Scan costs 0 MP. Useful for testing/debugging

-etr.description: Collapsing House, Opera House, and Floating Continent timers randomized

-etn.description: Collapsing House, Opera House, and Floating Continent timers removed

-yimperial.description: Transform NPC into random imperial unit

-ymain.description: Transform NPC into random main character

-yvxz.description: Cast vanish and x-zone on NPC

-frw.description: Removes only the worst flashes from animations. Ex: Learning Bum Rush, Bum Rush, Quadra Slam/Slice, Flash, etc.

-frm.description: Removes most flashes from animations. Includes Kefka Death.
